#1 Power Dialer

Power Dialer:

A smart dialer application

Dialer360 Power Dialer is a user-friendly technology that increases the calling efficiency of the agents by sorting out a list of numbers and making calls instantaneously, one after the other. With our Power Dialer, you can grow customer services, optimize sales campaigns to convert leads to consumers.

Request a Demo
5 star rating
★★★★★ 5/5

Trusted by over 12,000 business

Previous

Overview

What is a power dialer?

A power dialer is an automating dialing technique that adds the phone numbers to an agent calling queue automatically and starts dialing in a sequence. This dialing reduces the tiresome manual dialing, searching, and copy-pasting numbers. As compared to predictive and auto-dialers, a power dialer is used for the sales team as a productivity tool.

Request a Demo
How it works

How does the Power Dialer Works?

Reduce error chances by converting manual dialing into automatic dialing. Dialer360 Power Dialer automates calls and saves your time. Now you can can manage your dialing more effectively by following these simple steps:

Upload phonebook

Create outbound calls.

Dials number automatically

Dial numbers automatically

Answering calls connect with agents

Target customers and start auto-dialing.

Benefits

Something great
for you to improve efficiency!

Dialer360 Power Dialer is an advanced automated dialer that cuts the agents’ manual effort with automation and expands productivity.

Assign your required contacts to the list and the Power Dialer takes over for an automated dialing experience.

Best lead management

Minimize the chances of missing potential leads with our Power Dialer. With the help of this tool, you can always ensure that an agent is always available for engaging prospect calls.

Fast Dialing

With the Power dialer, you can enhance the sales Provide better speed in restricted time with this smart dialer.

Save Time

Improve revenue

Convert deals in time and make more sales to boost your revenue.

Accomplish target

your favourite CRM

Power Dialer FAQs?

FAQs

Here are some common questions regarding the Power Dialer software.

What is a power dialer?

A power dialer is an automated dialing technology that assigns phone numbers to an agent calling queue and starts dialing in a sequence. With this fastest dialing tool, you can get rid of the tiresome manual dialing, searching for contacts, and pasting numbers. As compared to the predictive or auto-dialers, a power dialer is used by the sales team as a highly productive outbound tool.

What is the difference between a Power dialer vs Predictive dialer?

A predictive dialer predicts the dialing speed by using an algorithm while a power dialer connects your agents with live calls. Moreover, the power dialer dials the next number after completing the first call as opposed to the predictive dialer which dynamically responds to the continuous workflow. You can choose the right tool according to your business requirement by contacting Dialer360.

What is the difference between a Power dialer vs Progressive dialer?

The Power Dialer and Progressive Dialer are almost similar with a key difference being that the Progressive Dialer can pause calls. The Power Dialer on the other hand makes continuous calls and keeps the call operations at full efficiency at all times.

What is the difference Between a Power Dialer vs Auto Dialer?

The main focus of the power dialer is having a live rep for each call. However, when all agents are engaged, no calls can be made. A solid power dialer is the best choice to increase the sales as it permits businesses to customize their messages according to each prospect. An auto dialer dials the number automatically from a list and connects the answered call to the agent or sends prerecorded messages.

What are the advantages of Power Dialer software?

Power dialer software is the best outbound dialer that boosts business efficiency and productivity. It has more benefits such as:

  • Eradicate manual dialing
  • Boost revenue
  • Improve overall performance
  • Increases call volume
  • Voicemail assistant

 

How does the Power Dialer work?

When a The Power Dialer skips unanswered or busy numbers automatically and moves to dialing the next number. When a call is answered, the Power Dialer instantly connects it an available agent. This is the fastest and most efficient method of calling where agents have more time to talk with customers.

How much does it cost to make calls with a power dialer?

The Power Dialer is a cost-efficient service. You can manage your budget by choosing the features you require. Different companies offer different rates because and it depends upon the features that you select.

Why would sales reps prefer to use Power Dialer?

Sales reps measure many factors to increase sales. The most important factor choosing the right tool. Dialer360 Power Dialer is best for increasing efficiency, ROI, and customer calls ratio, thus becoming the preferred tool for successful reps. It is the fastest and smartest dialer for your sales team. By skipping bad calls, it allows agents to focus on engaging with valuable prospects and rapidly achieve their sales target.

What are the requirements for using the Power Dialer?

Using a Power Dialer does not require infrastructure. You can utilize this tool to your existing setup no matter where it is. All you need is a laptop with a web browser, a good internet connection and a headset.

CLIENT REVIEWS

What our client's say about us

“This software has the most transparency of all that I've used in the past. The reports are really helpful in terms of allowing me to see how individual campaigns are performing and the real-time status bar is a real jewel for seeing what is or isn't happening.“
Coray W.
President
Other Products

Other products may you like

AI Dialer

Optimize your sales with our next-generation Ai dialer. It dials leads when picks up the lead then it connects to this lead to an available agent.

Voice Broadcast

Voice broadcasting is a wonderful communication facility that broadcasts your complete message to thousands of people at the same time.

Ringless Voicemail

Ringless voicemail is an efficient way of communication that permits the users to send the message directly into the individual voicemail inbox.
